effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
effect.emerald: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

effect.xd: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
short_effect.emerald: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
short_effect.firered_leafgreen: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
short_effect.colosseum: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.
flavor_text.emerald: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A severely damaging attack that makes the user rest on the next turn.
